__description__: Appendix C — Data Extraction Configuration for the Electoral Integrity Systematic Literature Review (ELIS SLR). Defines the extraction template, codebooks, computed fields, quality appraisal, and governance. Mirrors ELIS Protocol v1.4 (16 Aug 2025). Human reviewers extract and validate data; AI assistance is logged but not decisive.

extraction_template.__comment__: Field-by-field template. Each field includes id, label, type, requirement, and guidance.

fields.label: Study ID
fields.guidance: Unique identifier assigned by the project (e.g., ZTR-000123).

fields.label: DOI
fields.guidance: Digital Object Identifier, if available (e.g., 10.1016/j.electstud.2024.102789).

fields.label: Bibliographic Data
fields.guidance: Use the official citation; verify author order and year.

fields.label: Country / Region
fields.guidance: Select all countries/regions covered by the study.

fields.label: Study Design
fields.guidance: Primary methodological design (choose one).

fields.label: Method Type
fields.guidance: Quantitative, Qualitative, or Mixed.

fields.label: Voting System Type
fields.guidance: Select all that apply (e.g., DRE, optical scan, paper, Internet voting).

fields.label: Technical/Operational Mechanisms
fields.guidance: Mechanisms intended to improve integrity/auditability (e.g., VVPAT, E2E, RLA).

fields.label: Institutional/Legal Context
fields.guidance: Summarise the regulatory and administrative environment.

fields.label: Datasets / Materials
fields.guidance: Name datasets or repositories used (e.g., logs, ballots, surveys, Git repos).

fields.label: Outcomes Reported
fields.guidance: Primary outcomes (audit success, error rates, trust metrics, turnout effects, etc.).

fields.label: Effect Sizes / Key Estimates
fields.guidance: Record effect measure and confidence intervals when available.

fields.label: Implementation Details
fields.guidance: Deployment scale, pilots vs. national rollouts, training, logistics.

fields.label: Limitations (Authors')
fields.guidance: Quoted or paraphrased limitations stated by the authors.

fields.label: Risk of Bias (Reviewer)
fields.guidance: Reviewer appraisal per Appendix E (Low/Moderate/High/Unclear).

fields.label: Quality Appraisal Checklist
fields.guidance: Mark each item Yes/No/Partial/NA; add notes.

fields.label: Funding
fields.guidance: State funders; note potential conflicts of interest.

fields.label: Data/Code Availability
fields.guidance: Replication materials, URLs, repositories, or statement of unavailability.

fields.label: Policy/Practice Implications
fields.guidance: Actionable takeaways for electoral bodies/policymakers.

fields.label: Extracted by (Reviewer ID)
fields.guidance: Reviewer code (e.g., R1, R2).

fields.label: Verified by (Reviewer ID)
fields.guidance: Second reviewer verification (double extraction).

fields.label: Reviewer Notes
fields.guidance: Free-form observations, anomalies, cross-references.

codebook.__comment__: Controlled vocabularies and enumerations referenced by the template.

quality_appraisal.__comment__: Checklists mapped to ELIS quality framework (Appendix E).

output.rating_rule: Majority rule across items; ties resolved by reviewer judgement.

computed_fields.__comment__: Derived fields auto-calculated by the agent after extraction.

workflow.__comment__: Extraction process steps and inter-rater checks.

storage.__comment__: Where extracted data live and in what format(s).

llm_assist.__comment__: AI may draft summaries or pre-fill obvious metadata; humans verify everything.
llm_assist.logging: All AI-assisted steps recorded in Appendix F — AI Agents Log

governance.__comment__: Reproducibility, change control, and human oversight.
governance.amendments: Record any template changes in the changelog and OSF registration.

notes: Tailor codebooks to regional contexts as needed. Keep enumerations stable across the review to preserve consistency.

records.citation: Smith, J., & Patel, R. (2021). Risk-limiting audits... JET 15(2): 45–68.
records.outcomes_measured: Error rate; audit workload; public trust
records.key_findings: RLA reduced error rate; improved transparency.
